title: Create FO-09 affirmation agent with 5-per-batch and feedback loop
description:
Create the FO-09 affirmation agent at src/mastra/agents/fo-09/affirmation-agent.ts.

Base on FO-08's affirmation agent (src/mastra/agents/fo-08/affirmation-agent.ts) with these changes:

1. **5 affirmations per batch** (not 10). Update the prompt to request 5.
2. **Feedback loop support:** The agent prompt must support receiving:
   - Loved affirmations (generate more like these)
   - Discarded affirmations (avoid similar patterns)
   - All previous affirmations (do not repeat)
3. **Export as createFO09AffirmationAgent** function.

The feedback section template follows the established pattern from FO-02-FO-08 (see spec section 'Affirmation Prompt — Feedback Section').

NO summary agent needed for FO-09.

Files to create/modify:
- src/mastra/agents/fo-09/affirmation-agent.ts (new)
- src/mastra/agents/fo-09/index.ts (add export)

Reference:
- src/mastra/agents/fo-08/affirmation-agent.ts (base)
- app/fo-08/actions.ts lines 389-455 (buildAffirmationPrompt pattern)
- Spec: docs/projects/2026-01-30-fo-09/2026-01-30-fo-09-spec.md

⚠️ Do not close until acceptance criteria pass.
acceptance_criteria: File src/mastra/agents/fo-09/affirmation-agent.ts exists AND contains 'Generate 5' or 'generate 5' in the prompt AND npm run build succeeds
